# {{label|zh|Cantonese}} {{non-gloss definition|Placed at the end of a sentence in imperatives making it sound more like a request than an order.}}
#: {{zh-x|離開！|Leave!|C}}
#: {{zh-x|離開 啦！|Leave '''(please)'''!|C}}

=====Usage notes=====
* The first sentence is very impersonal and straight forward, whilst the second has been softened down by the particle {{lang|zh|啦}}.
* The usage of this particle is usually spoken, but its written form can be used in some informal writing. With more formal settings of writing, the Mandarin particle {{zh-l|吧|baa6}} is used instead.

=====Synonyms=====
* {{q|Mandarin}} {{zh-l|吧}}
